sentence.Network_en: They snobbishly excluded their less wealthy friends from the party.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们很势利地把那些不够富有的朋友排除在晚会之外.

PerfectNetExp.abs: treat snobbishly , put in one's place .势利地对待，使安分守己。

sentences.sentence: "they snobbishly excluded their less wealthy friends from the party"

auth_sentence.content: They're snobbishly hung up on the right way to serve everything, from sandwiches to wedding cake .
